title: Wire up FO-06 page with fo-experience
description:
Wire up the FO-06 page.tsx with the fo-experience component.

File to modify:
- `app/fo-06/page.tsx` - Import and render FOExperience

Ensure the page:
1. Imports FOExperience from './components/fo-experience'
2. Renders it as the main content
3. Has proper metadata/title

Reference: `app/fo-05/page.tsx`

⚠️ Do not close until /fo-06 loads and shows the name input screen.
acceptance_criteria: Navigating to /fo-06 shows name input screen (no progress bar visible)
closed_reason: Wired up page.tsx to render FOExperience component
